entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is Harry's cousin who was attacked by dementors.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character who used a Patronus to defend Dudley.

entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is Harry's uncle who does not understand what is happening.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are dark creatures that suck the happiness out of people.

relationships.description: Harry defended Dudley from the dementors.
Harry used a Patronus to defend against the dementors.
